title: Portland Crime Map
name: Portland Crime Map
description:
A Map by Jdchandler

Many of the crimes that I discuss on my blog www.portlandcrime.blogspot.com have geographic places associated with them.  This will be a way to map and cross reference them.

properties.name: A Lot of Blood
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler25th & Harrison, Corvallis, ORMay 11, 2006 -- Shawn Womack threw his bloody clothes into a dumpster near this corner after killing Marissa Manwarran, 17.

properties.name: A Lot of Blood
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1054 NW Fillmore #30, Corvallis ORJune, 2006 -- Shawn Womack and Jasmine Lesniak lived here. Womack killed 2 people in Northeast Portland and then killed Marissa Manwarren, 17.

properties.name: A Tragic Story Gets Weird
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1771 N.E. Bryant St Portland ORApril 14, 2006. A drive-by shooting seriously injures a 4 year-old boy at a Day Care Center.

properties.name: Ambassador Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler4744 N.E. Sandy Blvd, Portland ORFebruary 24, 1998 -- Jacqueline "Octavia" Anderson and Barbara J. Gilpin shot to death.

properties.name: Arbor Court Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1329 sw 14th, Portland ORNovember 20, 1933 -- W. Frank Akin, independent auditor working for Governor Meier, shot to death. This is one of Portland\'s great mysteries and most historians say that it was never solved. One man was convicted of murder in this case and the person who pulled the trigger was probably executed for another crime. Soon I will tell this forgotten story.

properties.name: Betrayed Trust
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler18201 SE Stark St, Portland ORMay 1, 2006 -- Daniel Alcazar, a teacher\'s aid, arrested for having sex with a 15 year-old student. Alcazar was a convicted murderer who had been hired without a background check.

properties.name: Blue Spot Video
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler3232 NE 82nd, Portland ORMay 28, 2006 -- Michael Burchett, 38, shot to death in parking lot. He was killed by two teenage boys who wanted his Honda.

properties.name: Borisch Home
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler13600 SE Market, Portland ORAugust 1, 1994 -- Joan Ann Borisch, 42, shot to death during a burglary. Daniel Alcazar, 16, served nearly 11 years for this killing. He was released in October, 2005. In May, 2006 Alcazar was arrested for having sex with a minor.

properties.name: Construction Site
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 15th Avenue and Alder Street, Portland ORFebruary 27, 1998 -- Eric Walter Running, 47, found after a suicide attempt. He was responsible for the shooting deaths of Jacqueline "Octavia" Anderson and Barbara J. Gilpin at the Ambassador Lounge.

properties.name: Death of Anna Banana
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2814 N.E. Andresen Road Vancouver WAApril 20, 2006. Anna Svidersky, 17, stabbed to death by a stranger while working at McDonalds.

properties.name: Donna Kuzmaak's House
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler3356 SE 13th Portland, ORMarch 21, 1979 -- Donna Kuzmaak, 23, beaten, stabbed and strangled to death in the basement of her home. This case is still unsolved in 2006.

properties.name: George House
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler7200 NE 42nd, Portland, ORGary George beaten to death April 2006. This murder is still unsolved, although there is a strange story involved. June, 2006 -- a suspect has been charged in this murder. you can read the details at http://portlandcrime.blogspot.com/2006/06/updates.html

properties.name: Green River Gary
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler Bull Mountain Rd, Tigard ORJune 13, 1985 -- Human bones were found near here (aproximate location). This turned out to be a cluster of Green River Killer victims. Remains fo four victims were found here: Denise Darcel Bush, Shirley Marie Sherrill, Tammy Liles and unidentified victim Oregon 1 were found here.

properties.name: Green River Gary
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler SW 3rd & Taylor, Portland ORThis area between SW 3rd and SW 4th between Taylor and Yamhill was once known as The Camp. It was an area of high prostitution and drug activity. Some of the Green River Killers victims had worked this area, although they mostly disappeared in Seattle.

properties.name: Harry Tracy: The Mackintosh Bandit
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandlersw naito parkway & market portland, orFebruary 5, 1899 - Dave Merrill was arrested at his mother\'s house on this spot. He told police that his partner Harry Tracy would arrive in Portland the next day.

properties.name: I've Been Thinking About Murder Lately
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler7227 S.E. Flavel St portland orJuly 17, 1992 Donna Ferguson, 18, and Todd Rudiger, 28

properties.name: I've Been Thinking About Murder Lately
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler8036 S.E. Raymond St. portland, orJuly 3, 1991. Jay Rickbeil, 40, stabbed to death in his bedroom in the Tamarind Apartments. Sebastian Shaw was convicted of this murder in 2006.

properties.name: It's a Family Affair
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 5706 N. Mississippi Ave, Portland ORNovember 20, 2002 -- Asia Bell, 23, shot to death and her husband, Tyrone James, 26, blinded in a shooting on the front porch of their home. This case is still unsolved http://www.portlandonline.com/police/index.cfm?a=gadad&c=dfihe

properties.name: It's a Family Affair
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler NE Killingsworth & 42nd, Portland ORFebruary 7, 2005 -- Wilando Bell, 20, shot and killed and his brother Willie, 24, wounded during a confrontation with the man who robbed this convenience store.

properties.name: It's a Family Affair
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler NE Fremont & 7th, Portland ORNovember 2, 2003 -- Isaiah Strickland, 17, shot to death in this parking lot. Police believe they know the killer, but over a dozen witnesses refuse to come forward and testify.

properties.name: It's a Family Affair
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler NE Fremont & Rodney, Portland ORJanuary 19, 1996 -- Kern McClure, 34, beaten and stomped to death in a house near this corner. This is still unsolved and I am very interested in any information on this case.

properties.name: Killer Thieves
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerNE Davis & 111th, Portland ORMay 13, 2006 -- Chai Taphom, 28, shot to death. He may have been abducted from the parkinglot at Blue Spot video.

properties.name: Like Talking to a Reptile
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2800 SE Hawthorne, Portland ORHawthorne Safeway Sebastian Alexander Shaw worked as a checker at this store in 1994-1995. During this time he may have killed Jenny Lin in Castro Valley, CA. He has also been convicted of the rape of a woman he saw inhis checkout line.

properties.name: Murder in Portland's Old Chinatown
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Pine and SW 2nd Ave Portland ORNovember 10, 1893. Gong Fa, 23, stabbed to death at the corner os SW 2nd Ave and Pine St. This crime is still unsolved.

properties.name: Oakwood Park Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler 17235 SW Heritage Ct., Aloha, ORJune 28, 1996 -- Eight people, 3 adults and 5 children died in a fire. Ray Deford, 11, was convicted of setting the fire.

properties.name: Portland Confidential
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW 10th & Taylor, Portland OR1940s -- Clover Room -- This was one of Portland\'s hottest nightclubs. Sammy Davis Jr. got his start singing here with the Will Mastin Trio.

properties.name: Portland Confidential
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler11834 SE Powell, Portland ORJuly, 1968 -- This was Jim Elkins\' last residence in portland. In the 40s and 50s Elkins was the boss of Portland crime. In 1968 his home was raided and lots of stolen goods were found. Elkins died mysteriously a few months later.

properties.name: Portland Confidential
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler525 SW Stark, Portland OR1940s - Pago Pago Room - this was the most stylish underworld hangout during this period.

properties.name: Red Sea Restaraunt
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler318 sw third ave portland orDecember 1988 -- Tim Moreau starts a recorded music dance club that meets here twice a week. He would later be murdered at Starry Night.

properties.name: Rock n Roll Homicide
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2474 N.W. Overton St Portland, ORJanuary, 1990 -- Tim Moreau lived in a basement apartment here. He worked at Starry Night and was murdered there by his employer.

properties.name: Sav-Mor Grub
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler101 NW 6th Ave Portland ORAugust 24, 1989 Sav-Mor Grub a grocery/convenience store firebombed and burned to the ground. Larry Hurwitz, owner of Starry Night, a nearby nightclub and Al Jasper, onwer of Marco Polo, would be found guilty of this crime in 2000. The photo shows the corner as it looks in 2006.

properties.name: Siskiyou Outrage 1923
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerOctober 11, 1923 (Aproximate location) Tunnel #13 where Southern Pacific #13 "The Gold Special" was robbed by the D\'Autremont Brothers in the last Old West Train Robbery in history.

properties.name: Starry Night
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler8 NW 6th Ave Portland ORJanuary 23, 1990 - Tim Moreau, 21, an employee at Starry Night strangled to death in the basement of the club. Larry Hurwitz, the club\'s owner, would be convicted of this murder more than a decade later. The Photo shows this location in 2006.

properties.name: The Dark Strangler
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1521 SE 21st Ave Portland OrNovember 3, 1926. Mabel MacDonald Flukes, strangled, raped and left in the attic of a house for rent.

properties.name: The Dark Strangler
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler815 E. Lincoln Portland OROctober 31, 1926. Beata Withers, 35, found strangled, raped and stuffed into a trunk in the attic of a home she had for rent.

properties.name: The Dark Strangler
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler604 SE 22nd Portland ORNovember 1 ,1926. Virginia A. Grant, strangled, raped and stuffed behind a furnace in the basement of a vacant house she had for rent.

properties.name: The Gangs That Can't Shoot Straight
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerSW Oak and Fifth portland, orApril 18,2006 James Lee Sims, recently released from prison, shot and wounded about 4pm.

properties.name: The Gangs That Can't Shoot Straight
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerN. Killingsworth and Commercial, Portland, orApril 25, 2006 Todd Rutherford Jr, 15, wounded in drive-by shooting. Quintrell Holiman and Javier Rhone, both 17, and associated with the Hoover Crips gang, were arrested for Rutherford’s shooting on May 3.

properties.name: The Gangs That Can't Shoot Straight
properties.description: Posted by JdchandlerN. Mississippi and Holman St. Portland, ORMay 12, 2006 - Acey Runningbird, 20, and Marcus Ball, 29 were arrested in the shooting that occured at NE 60th and Cully late on May 11.

properties.name: The Gangs That Can't Shoot Straight
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandlerne 60th and Cully, Portland, orMay 11, 2006 - 3 people wounded in drive-by shooting while waiting for a bus. Two men Acey Runningbird, 20, and Marcus Ball, 29 were arrested in the shooting. One suspect is still at large on May 12.

properties.name: The Pandora's Box Murder
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler2124 SE Yamhill Portland ORJuly 27, 1946. Fern Bowden was killed in an explosion when she opened her husband\'s footlocker in the basement of their home 2124 SE Yamhill. James Bowden was convicted of first degree murder for booby-trapping the footlocker.

properties.name: Unanswered Questions
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler9500 NE Gertz Cir, Portland ORApril 24, 2006 -- Bobby Barnes, 51, a transient was arrested near here shortly after Gary George was beaten to death in his home. Barnes was arrested on an unrelated parole violation, but was later charged with George\'s murder.

properties.name: We All Scream For Ice Cream
properties.description: Posted by Jdchandler1543 SE 35th Ave Portland ORJanuary 7, 1980. Ruth Anne O\'Neill, 4, abducted and drowned by her 13 year-old neighbor.
